plot_count_density(bcbio, counts)

plot_counts_per_gene(bcbio, normalized_counts)

plot_deseq_pca(bcbio, dt, label = TRUE)

plot_exonic_mapping_rate(bcbio)

plot_gender_markers(bcbio, normalized_counts)

plot_gene_detection_saturation(bcbio, raw_counts)

plot_genes_detected(bcbio, raw_counts)

plot_intronic_mapping_rate(bcbio)

plot_mapping_rate(bcbio)

plot_rrna_mapping_rate(bcbio)

plot_total_reads(bcbio)

Arguments

bcbio

bcbio-nextgen run object

normalized_counts

Normalized counts matrix. Can be obtained from DESeqDataSet by running counts(normalized = TRUE). Transcripts per million (TPM) are also acceptable.

dt

DESeqTransform generated from rlog() or vst() on a DESeqDataSet object. We prefer to pipe the transformed data in to this function because the operation is CPU intensive, and is slow when applied to multiple PCA plot operations.

label

Superimpose sample text labels on the plot

raw_counts

Raw counts matrix. Can be obtained from DESeqDataSet by running counts(normalized = FALSE).

Value

Density plot

Boxplot

PCA plot

Bar plot

Scatter plot

Smooth plot

Bar plot

Bar plot

Bar plot

Bar plot

Bar plot

Bar plot
